meta.content: DeLaSalle Education Center is committed to serving students in a high school setting where personalized education, holistic services, and work face development are all incorporated to benefit our students.

div.h1: We've moved our website to www.DeLaSalleCenter.com

p.strong: to learn more about our school and find enrollment information.
